snippet: Mr. Lewandowski joined the cable news network in June in a deal denounced by some as a violation of journalistic ethics. He is reportedly interested in a job in the Trump administration....

byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman and Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Lewandowski joined the cable news network in June in a deal denounced by some as a violation of journalistic ethics. He is reportedly interested in a job in the Trump administration.

headline.main: Corey Lewandowski, Donald Trump’s Former Campaign Manager, Leaves CNN
headline.print_headline: Trump Insider Quits His Job  as an Analyst for CNN
